great gameplay when it works enemies scale which makes getting anything better pointless more importantly the game has unpatched bugs and crashes its not worth it to by only to have all these issues given the game has linearstory progression it makes it painful for it to crash out and then have to start the long arse questbattles all over again  hard truck a lemon because the game keeps breaking down is a more befitting title

the game has a linear story and many bugs on computers with windows 10 dont max out the settings because itll crash especially anisotropic filtering you need to change it to trilinear enemies respawn in the same area after you leave a town the maximum resolution is 1600x1200 you can accidentally break missions by doing things out of sequence so constant quick saves are a must overall the game has a great vibe but you can tell its old and this steam release is not perfect

game of my childhood which i absoultely in love with  advantages  amazing physics  tonns of weapons with additional upgrades cannons shotguns machine guns energoweapons  lots of vehicle upgrades acceleration power armour  huge map with amazing location variety  disadvantages  dozens of bugs which will never be fixed  plot is not ended properly and just cuts off  you should definitely try this masterpiece if youre not scared of old games

one of the games from my childhood had it on cd now to be able to play it on steam is quite surreal amazing game with great graphics great storyline and clearly ahead of its time to think that this game is made in 2005 is absurd ive encountered few bugs but nothing that made the game unplayable just a lil annoying other than that i highly recommend this game to everyone get your own truck and start exploring this complex world
